snippet: El Mundo newspaper has revived allegations that Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy and other senior party leaders received payments from a party slush fund.
abstract: Spanish newspaper El Mundo publishes report accusing Prime Min Mariano Rajoy and other party leaders of having received payments from party slush fund; governing Popular Party denies accusations.
lead_paragraph: El Mundo newspaper has revived allegations that Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy and other senior party leaders received payments from a party slush fund.

headline.main: In Spain, Governing Party Denies Illicit Payouts
headline.print_headline: Spain: Denial of a Party Slush Fund
